price: No fatigue will ever touch them therein[22], nor will they ever be made to leave.
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ
footnotes: [22] i.e., untainted by drawbacks of toil or uneasiness about the future.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
